articles.description: Andy Farrell's British and Irish Lions look to make an early impact down under as they face Western Force on Saturday in their first tour match.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions 2025: Finn Russell's craft could be key against Western Force

articles.description: Manchester City and Chelsea are already quids in from playing in the Fifa Club World Cup - and could end up earning loads more.
articles.title: Fifa Club World Cup: How much have Man City and Chelsea earned so far?

articles.description: George Russell has made clear that Mercedes are talking to Max Verstappen about potentially driving for them in 2026. Andrew Benson explores what might happen next.
articles.title: George Russell, Max Verstappen and Merecedes: What factors are at play and might happen next?

articles.description: Manchester United have improved bid worth up to £62.5m for Bryan Mbeumo rejected by Brentford.
articles.title: Bryan Mbeumo: Manchester United's second bid worth £62.5mfor forward rejected by Brentford

articles.description: Josh Hazlewood claims five wickets as Australia wrapped up an emphatic 159-run victory against West Indies in the first Test in Barbados.
articles.title: West Indies vs Australia: Josh Hazlewood takes 5-43 as hosts lose 10 wickets in final session in Barbados

articles.description: British qualifier Oliver Tarvet calls for a change in United States college rules after being unable to take home his full Wimbledon prize money.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025: British qualifier Oliver Tarvet calls for change in NCAA prize money rule

articles.description: Interviews with substituted players and camera access to dressing rooms will feature in Premier League TV coverage next season.
articles.title: Premier League: Touchline interviews with substituted players set to begin next season

articles.description: Lando Norris leads team-mate and title rival Oscar Piastri to a McLaren one-two in Friday practice at the Austrian Grand Prix.
articles.title: Austrian Grand Prix: Lando Norris quickest ahead of Oscar Piastri in Friday practice

articles.description: Lyon are included in the Ligue 1 fixtures for next season despite being demoted to France's second tier because of poor finances.
articles.title: Lyon included in Ligue 1 fixtures for 2025-26 despite demotion to second tier

articles.description: England's managing director of men's cricket Rob Key discusses Jofra Archer's importance to the Test side and acknowledges the risk of the fast bowler's return.
articles.title: Jofra Archer: England quick can 'create a legacy' in Test cricket, says Rob Key
